value.stringValue: There are no available actions to update this Opportunity. This could be because a Bid Exists or because the Opportunity is already Closed.

value.stringValue: Close this Bid and the Opportunity

assignments.name: Add_Progress_Option_to_Quick_Choice_Bid
assignments.label: Add Progress Option to Quick Choice (With Bid)

value.stringValue: Update the Bid and Opportunity to reflect the latest progress

assignments.label: Add Resubmit Option to Quick Choice

decisions.description: If the Record is not Closed and one of the Bid Approvals is not active and Head of Bid is provided then provide the option to progress
decisions.name: Allow_Progress_Option
decisions.label: Allow Progress Option?

decisions.description: If the Opp Approval has been recalled/rejected then allow an option to resubmit the Approval Request.
decisions.name: Allow_Resubmit_Option
decisions.label: Allow Resubmit Option?

rules.name: Yes_Allow_Re_Submit_for_Approval_Option_Outcome
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Yes - Allow Re-Submit for Approval Option

decisions.description: Check that options were added for the Quick Choice component. Otherwise show error toast.
decisions.name: Any_Options_Added
decisions.label: Any Options Added?

decisions.description: Is the Bid eligible to be submitted for Bid/No Bid approval?

decisions.description: If this flow is triggered as a subflow then move immediately to progress.
decisions.name: Triggered_as_Subflow

fields.name: No_Available_Options_Message
fields.fieldText: There are currently no options available to your user to update this Bid. Please check back later.

fields.name: Opp_Approval_Pending_DT
fields.fieldText:
You cannot currently update this Bid because the record is locked until an Approval Process completes.


Please try again later.

fields.name: Head_of_Bid_Missing_Progress_Message
fields.fieldText: To progress this Bid the Head of Bid field must be populated on the Opportunity
